definition: and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)

sentences.english: Rather he'll say, "It's for the child's own good.
sentences.chinese: 而是说，“这都是为了孩子好。

sentences.english: My heart is not pain, but pain has long been numb.
sentences.chinese: 我的心一点也不痛，而是早已痛的麻木了。

sentences.english: Invoiced packaging on loan will not be paid for; it will be returned carriage paid.
sentences.chinese: 包装费不单独支付，而是与运费一起支付。

sentences.english: A swoosh doesn’t make it good design. It’s just lazy.
sentences.chinese: 旋风产非好的设计，而是一种懒惰。

sentences.english: But learn from them. They scale and serve millions of users.
sentences.chinese: 而是从中学习，他们服务于数以百万的用户。

sentences.english: Not merely intellectual but also spiritual;
sentences.chinese: 研经不只是知识上的，而是灵性上的。

sentences.english: Instead of punishing a child for violating a school policy, they battle the policy.
sentences.chinese: 不因为触犯了学校的纪律惩罚孩子，而是攻击校规。

sentences.english: No - all these small girls -- they must build Yemen.
sentences.chinese: 而是所有的这些小女孩，这是他们的使命。

sentences.english: Istead of smiling, each of them made a face.
sentences.chinese: 他们没有笑，而是每个人都做了个苦脸。

sentences.english: But an interview is not an interrogation; it's a conversation.
sentences.chinese: 但是面试并非是审问，而是一次交谈。

sentences.english: He is not handsome but ugly.
Content that is hidden to the user is not removed from the page, but is obscured.
sentences.chinese: 对用户隐藏的信息并没有从页面上除去，而是隐藏了。

sentences.english: It's from the argument about self-ownership.
sentences.chinese: 而是来源于自我拥有论的观点。

sentences.english: Strength alone knows conficts, weakness is below even defeat , and is born vanquished.
sentences.chinese: 弱者甚至连失败都不够资格，而是生来就是被征服的。

definition: and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
to be in/to lie in/to consist in/to depend on/to rest with
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
